mapper.select: SELECT c.id_country as idCountry, c.country as country FROM countries c

SELECT SUM(a.data) AS data, MAX(a.in_date) AS inDate, a.id_location AS idLocation, d.type AS datatype FROM data a, datatypes d, locations l, countries c WHERE a.id_location = l.id_location AND a.id_datatype = d.id_datatype AND c.id_country = l.id_country AND l.id_departament = 0 -- id_department must be 'All' if not will repeat in the sum AND c.id_country = #{idCountry} GROUP BY d.type
